additional_info:
Storeroom, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas, electricity 
 Project Saguramo Fields located in the Mtskheta district in the Eastern part of Georgia, only 20 km north from Tbilisi center, in Saguramo. At this stage 'Saguramo Fields' consists of 9 single private houses located on a total land plot of 5,600 M2. The total area of each house is approximately 130 M2, and the plot size varies between 520 to 630 M2, depending on the location in the project. We launched the exciting Saguramo Fields project few months ago and construction is underway! The first 2 houses are completed, fully renovated and ready to move - in, Starting from $99,000 for a fully renovated house of approximately 130 Sq.M, TBC Bank mortgages are available, starting from 0%, . For the detailed information please Check us out & like us on our facebook page https://www.facebook.com/SaguramoFields for the latest updates & developments, Feel free to contact us with any question you may have, to schedule an appointment & site tours. www.saguramo.ge'
